item.description: Let's organize active events and help each other keep track of our fitness and weight goals. This is just an organizational meeting.  If you're interested in doing this but can't make the day or time (or the location is not good for you) please let me know.  We will come up with some regular activities in different locations at different times to try to have as many people involved as possible.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have a sign "Travel Group" at our table.

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: Get fit and healthy (or healthier) for spring
